follow_up_questions.selected_insight: Money earned from coffee sales shows a clear decreasing trend throughout the day, peaking in the Morning and declining towards Night.
selected_facts: The decreasing trend of money over Time_of_Day(s) from Morning to Night.
The lowest (least) value of the money is Time_of_Day Morning.
The highest (most) value of the money is Time_of_Day Morning.
follow_up_questions.question: How does the average money earned from coffee sales vary across different Time_of_Day?
follow_up_questions.suggested_viz_title: Average Coffee Sales Revenue by Time of Day
follow_up_questions.rationale: This question provides a high-level view of revenue distribution over the day, helping to confirm and visualize the overall decreasing pattern.

follow_up_questions.selected_insight: During the Afternoon, Hot Chocolate generates the highest revenue while Espresso consistently ranks lowest among coffee types.
selected_facts: The highest (most) value of the money is coffee_name Hot Chocolate when Time_of_Day is Afternoon.
The lowest (least) value of the money is coffee_name Espresso when Time_of_Day is Afternoon.
In the money ranking of different coffee_name(s), the top three coffee_name(s) are Hot Chocolate, Cappuccino, Cappuccino  when Time_of_Day is Afternoon.
In the money ranking of different coffee_name(s), the last three coffee_name(s) are Espresso, Espresso, Espresso  when Time_of_Day is Afternoon.
follow_up_questions.question: How does money earned differ among coffee_name categories during different Time_of_Day intervals?
follow_up_questions.suggested_viz_title: Coffee Sales Revenue by Type and Time of Day
follow_up_questions.rationale: This question drills into how coffee type performance varies by time, highlighting the significance of the top and bottom performers during specific periods.

follow_up_questions.selected_insight: Latte consistently ranks highest on Fridays and displays a decreasing trend in revenue towards Sunday.
selected_facts: In the money ranking of different Weekday(s), the top three Weekday(s) are Latte, Latte, Latte  when Weekday is Fri.
The decreasing trend of money over Weekday(s) when coffee_name is Latte from Fri to Sun.
The highest (most) value of the money is Weekday Fri when coffee_name is Latte.
The lowest (least) value of the money is Weekday Sun when coffee_name is Latte.
follow_up_questions.question: How does average money earned from coffee sales vary across different coffee_name?
follow_up_questions.rationale: This question provides a high-level view of revenue distribution across coffee types, building on the insight of Latte's dominance and general revenue variation by coffee_name.

follow_up_questions.selected_insight: Americano sales peak on Friday and show a decreasing revenue trend towards the weekend, with the lowest values occurring on Monday.
selected_facts: In the money ranking of different Weekday(s), the top three Weekday(s) are Fri, Thu, Tue  when coffee_name is Americano.
In the money ranking of different Weekday(s), the last three Weekday(s) are Sat, Thu, Wed  when coffee_name is Americano.
The decreasing trend of money over Weekday(s) when coffee_name is Americano from Fri to Sun.
The highest (most) value of the money is Weekday Fri when coffee_name is Americano.
The lowest (least) value of the money is Weekday Mon when coffee_name is Americano.
follow_up_questions.question: How does money earned from coffee_name vary across Weekday for different coffee_name, especially Americano?
follow_up_questions.suggested_viz_title: Money by Coffee Name Over Weekdays
follow_up_questions.rationale: This question drills down into the significance of weekday trends specifically for coffee_name, allowing to see temporal revenue patterns by coffee_name such as the Americano's weekday peak and decline.

selected_facts: The highest (most) value of the money is coffee_name Hot Chocolate when Time_of_Day is Afternoon.
The highest (most) value of the money is coffee_name Latte when Time_of_Day is Morning.
The highest (most) value of the money is coffee_name Cappuccino when Time_of_Day is Night.
The decreasing trend of money over Time_of_Day(s) from Morning to Night.
For Americano with Milk, Afternoon is the most profitable time, with revenue declining significantly by Night.
follow_up_questions.question: How does revenue from different coffee types vary across Weekdays for each Time_of_Day?
follow_up_questions.suggested_viz_title: Coffee Revenue Patterns by Time and Weekday
follow_up_questions.rationale: Exploring 'coffee_name' in relation to 'Time_of_Day' and 'Weekday' reveals how sales for each coffee type fluctuate not only by time but also by the day of the week. This deepens the analysis by showing weekly trends in demand for specific coffees, which is critical for targeted promotions and inventory planning.
